biotools.summary: Improved global protein homolog detection with major gains in function identification. PRotein Ortholog Search Tool is a new homolog detection tool that utilizes ESM-1b language model and iDCT quantization method. PROST is fast and accurate compared to traditional tools.

bioschemas.name: PROST
bioschemas.summary: Improved global protein homolog detection with major gains in function identification. PRotein Ortholog Search Tool is a new homolog detection tool that utilizes ESM-1b language model and iDCT quantization method. PROST is fast and accurate compared to traditional tools.
